attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: consider, when same-sex couples register their Civil Partnership in the UK, it would be part of the formality for a Civil Register Office to inform the parties concerned that any previous inheritance arrangement made may be revoked.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
